summary: Welcome to the Spiceworks Help Desk
description:
A help desk is a support system designed to help you assist end users with technical and functional questions by letting them submit their questions electronically.

An internal Help Desk can greatly reduce the amount of time you spend tracking work and responding to users and also makes it easy for you to track and report on the amount of time that you spend doing IT related functions.

Ready to get started?
- Click the 'New Ticket' button on the toolbar to create your first ticket.
- Check out the User Portal. This is where your users can submit and track issues.
- Configure the advanced Help Desk features using the Help Desk Wizard.
The Spiceworks Help Desk can be configured to allow your users to submit their help requests via email. To set up this feature check out the Help Desk Wizard.

summary: Notify Your Users of Issues via the  Help Desk Portal
description:
Spiceworks Help Desk comes pre-configured with a help desk portal that allows your users to submit any help requests that they might have by using their web browser. No configuration is required for you to use this feature.

Your users can access this web page from the following URL: User Portal

If you would like to edit the notifications that are displayed on this page, such as alerting them to email server issues or network problems, select 'Email Setup' in the menu next to the 'Settings' button in the toolbar above.

description: Click here to watch the Help Desk Overview Video
